“Jackass!” Anna yelled after him, only to be answered with another series of snorts and oinks. She punched the couch in frustration, ignoring the waves the rose throughout her body because of the movement. She was really mad at him.

“You know what?! I’d rather be a pig than an ass like you! And I wish everyone could see it! I wish they’d all see what everyone really was!” she shouted, forgetting that she had a magic wishing stone on her finger that would grant almost any wish she had.

“Yeah right, fat sow!” Adam shouted back at her.

“Jackass” the girl groaned, before placing two chocolates in her mouth. “So what if I’m a pig?” she muttered, eating another candy. “Pigs are nice” a little droll escaped from her mouth when she popped another treat in. “They’re smart *snort*… not like stupid asses *grunt*. And they get to play in the mud *snort snort* and eat anything they want *grunt*” she told herself. "I like *grunt* pigs *snort snort*". At some point in her little monologue she had stopped using her hands and brought the box at face level, eating her goodies directly out of it. She didn’t seem to notice this. She also didn’t notice that bits of chocolate mixed with drool were dripping off her chin, making a mess in the box and all over herself. Neither did she realize that she was starting to mimic the very sounds that Adam was making earlier. Without stopping her sweet feast she looks at the screen in front of her.

“Whaf tha- *grunt*?” she asked with a mouthful of chocolate. The pretty lady on the TV seemed different. The tip of her button nose had turned downward and her upper lip seemed to have receded a bit, revealing a pair of buck teeth that Anna was sure she hadn’t seen before. Looking closely she realized that the lady’s ears were twice as long as they should be and they were pointing upwards.

The woman turned to the side to grab some papers and Anna’s mouth dropped when at what she saw. She wasn’t sure what surprised her more: the two inch ears that were now poking through her hair and not showing any intention of stopping, or the small snout that the lady’s face was pushing into. When she faced the camera again the tips of her pointy ears were about two inches over the top of her head and she had a cleft lip leading down from her smaller and flatter nose to her large front teeth that strongly resembled a rodent’s. Her nostrils were forming a slight V shape on her face and fine hairs were poking out of her cheeks, building into her new pair of whiskers.

The lady’s large, blue eyes widened suddenly and she shrieked, grabbing her still growing ears with her perfectly manicured hands. The sound was painful and Anna pushed her head downwards, as if to hide between her soft shoulders. She felt the cushioning of her double chin, but she didn’t hear her own piggish squeal over the woman’s scream.

“What’s happening to me?” the lady on TV yelled in her high pitched voice. The camera seemed to be shaking and Anna could swear she heard a cow mooing and some dogs barking. “What’s going on?” the woman shrieked again. Her cheeks had swollen, making her face look like a failed cross between a rabbit and a human. She stood up from her chair and Anna noted that except for the bump visible just above her ass, her body hadn’t changed.

Anna was too busy staring at the panicking rabbit lady to think that it was her reckless wish that has caused this. She could hear pig grunts, but her mind couldn’t grasp the idea that she was the one producing them so she just supposed that they were coming from the TV, like all the other animal sounds.

But suddenly there was a call that definitely wasn’t coming out of the TV. And that sound was:
11212111112.title: Angry

112121111122.content:
Anna was pulled out of her trance by the loud sound that was coming from the kitchen.

“Oh my clukod!” she heard her mother’s voice and then there was a breaking sound. “BAWK!”

“Mom? *snort*” Anna called, shifting her weight to relieve a bit of the pain she was feeling just above her butt. “Boy, that stupid wish really messed things up” she thought, cursing her unintentional wish to grow a larger belly.

“No! Ouch!” her mother cried from the kitchen and Anna suddenly felt very worried. She tossed the box of chocolates aside, not bothering to look that the mess she had made in it splashed a bit on the cushions. She swung her feet a few times before she could get enough momentum to lift herself off the couch. Once up, she leaned forward, to balance herself, but she didn’t have time to notice how far her belly hung from her body because a loud “CRACK!” was heard and then she could feel a cool breeze on her ass and thighs and the pain she was feeling vanished.

“*snort grunt* no!” she said, placing her hand on her flabby butt and feeling the shredded material, as well as her bare skin. Even her panties had ripped. She had to grab her gut in both her arms and lift it, to be able to straighten herself. She felt a lot heavier than she had been when she came downstairs. Releasing her belly, she saw that it now hung over her waistline all the way to her crotch. Her tank top, that fit her well earlier, was now stretched out and struggling to contain her bulk. About a foot of her belly sagged out of it.

“Cluck, cluck, cluck, Bawk! ” the sounds were coming from the kitchen and Anna tried to hurry to her mother. She tried putting one foot in front of the other, but she almost fell when her right leg was met by the bulk of her left leg. Reaching down and feeling her thighs, she learned that she now owned a hefty pair of thunder thighs. She grunted and proceeded to waddle towards the kitchen, completely oblivious to the porcine snorts that escaped her mouth every time she took a step. She was, however, very aware of the way her legs rubbed together and her sagging belly slapped her crotch at her every move.

By the time she reached the kitchen she felt very hot, but she was hardly sweating. She was breathing heavily and beginning to wonder why the piggish snorts and squeals sounded just as loud when all the other animal noises from TV were so far away.

“SQUEEEEEAAALL!” the animalistic sound erupted from her lips and her brain was overwhelmed by the sight of her mother and the sudden realization that she was the one releasing that unhuman squeal.

“SQUUEEEEAAAAL!” she went again, her eyes glued to the enormous orb that had burst out of her mother’s nice shirt. It was nothing like Anna’s blob of lard that sagged over her waistband; her mother’s belly looked ridiculously bloated and taunt, like she had just swallowed a huge beach ball. The inflation seemed to originate just below her neck, reaching its peak somewhere around the place where her waist should have been and then slowly rounding out until it got to the crotch area.

“BAWK! Anna *cluck*! AnnAWK!” the woman called at her daughter, but the girl simply continued to emit her piggish squeal. Her hands were raised and trembling, but she was too scared to explore any other change that might have occurred. She could see that her mother’s neck had elongated and was now supporting something that resembled a soft dewlap. Her mouth seemed extremely large even though her lips were pushed forward, as if they were puckered up. Her head kept moving back and forth, the way a chicken’s head would, releasing soft ‘cluck’ sounds at every few seconds.

“BWAK! BAWK BWAAAAK!” the woman screamed, grabbing her behind as it visibly began to swell.

“SNORT SNORT MOM! SQUEEEEAAL!” Anna cried, waddling towards her mother, who was desperately trying to take her pants off. Both her ass and the lower part of her back were inflating, putting serious strain on the green material. The girl could practically hear its sounds of protests as it was forced to its limits.

“BAAAWK! BAAAAWK!” Anna’s mom screamed as the pressure increased. “BWAAT! CUT! CUAAAAWK!” she pleaded and the girl understood. Grabbing a small but sharp kitchen knife, she cut the leg of the pants, where the material was still loose and she wouldn’t hurt her mother. Then, with great effort, more of it due to her bulk than the material’s resistance, she managed to rip her pants open. The girl collapsed on her soft, bubble butt and looked up at her mother.

The woman’s ass was now sticking about a foot behind her, stretching her white undies to the limit, but none of the flesh sagged. It didn’t even look like fat. Her whole body, huge as it was, seemed very firm. The shape reminded Anna of a chicken and the words “mother hen” crossed her mind.

“Oh shit!” the girl thought, remembering her ring and the foolish wish she had made. She looked around the room and her eyes were quickly drawn to one of the counters that had a glass door and made for a perfect mirror.

“SQUUEEAAAAL! SNORT! NO! SQUEEEAL! NOUUEEEEEAAAL! SQUEEAAAL!” the girl screamed, her hands reaching for her face. Her eyes were bulging out and her fingers roamed her soft cheeks, looking for anything to would tell her that what she was seeing wasn’t true. Her cheeks that had previously been round and fat looked almost inhumanly bloated, sticking out of her face like she was holding two tennis balls in her mouth, one in each side. Her nose was turned upwards and huge, pushing out in an ugly, wet porcine snout. Her ears had left their regular spots and migrated to the top of her head. She was now the owner of two flappy, pink, pig ears.

“BWAAAAK! BWAAAAAK! NOOO! BWOOOK!” her mom screamed, her face looking terrified and her hands desperately trying to grab her huge, inflated ass. “NOOAK! BWAAAK!” she creamed again, clawing at her underwear.

“SQUUUEAAAL!” Anna cried too, when she looked up at her mother and saw a bulge in her panties, where her vagina should’ve been.

“BWAAAK!” “SQUEEEAAL!” they both screamed as the bulge grew bigger. It eventually got as large as her fist and it seemed to drop into her panties. Anna reached up and tugged on the material. She squealed and retreated when a white object fell on the floor. It was an egg.

The mother screamed at the sight of the broken egg, splattered on the kitchen floor. Both their changes seemed to have stopped. Anna was starting to calm down, soothing herself with the knowledge that in 24 hours she would be snout free, but her mother was still panicking. She was barely able to force anything other than clucking out of her mouth and her thin legs were shaking under her heavy bulk. Her frame strongly resembled that of a chicken. Anna gulped, running her hand over her massive belly, slowly reaching behind her, where she remembered a pain earlier. A series of grunts and snorts escaped her porcine snout when her fingers reached her small, curled tail.

It was Erica, Anna's little sister. She had long, shiny, practically luminous brown hair, just like Anna's, but there the similarities ended. Where Anna took after her mother, with an open, expressive face, somewhat full, pink lips, and a potentially athletic frame, Erica was more like their father, with dark red lips (chapped because of her habit of chewing on them), a near-perpetual deadpan, a rather thinner build, and a caustic sense of humor that fluctuated between sarcastic and ironic, although she considered herself just as good a target for it as anybody else. At a little less than a head shorter than Anna, she was a genius, with an IQ of 169. While she was still in normal school, this was mostly for social reasons, and she had supplementary classes to teach her at her level.

She walked in, took one look at her, said "sorry, wrong room," left, turned around, and said, "Anna? Is that you?"

This was an unusually sober reaction to Erica seeing Anna with actual boobs. It must have been the shock value. "Hey, sis," she said. "What'cha doing? Besides barging into my room unannounced, I mean." Time to turn Erica's sense of humor against her.

Barry lay on the floor. Squeezing his eyes closed, as he tried to process what had just happened. The blinding light from the rock.

Nah! That had to be his imagination. Surely it was a power surge and he'd caught a bad reflection right into his eyes. He snorted at his casual wish, wondering what it'd truly be like to be a woman for a day, or a week.

Planting his elbows on the floor. Barry started to ease himself back upright. But as he did that, he started to feel a number of things were ... off.

His clothes feeling looser, and more extensive. His eyes still stung and refused to focus. Resting his back against the bed he got himself into a sitting position. The sense of wrongness was still there, intensifying if nothing else.

It wasn't just his clothes that felt wrong. Wondering if he'd banged his head harder than he realised, he got to his feet. Swaying slightly as he did. Balancing was harder with his vision still blurry. Scrunching and unscrunching his eyes, he fought to clear away the tears and the bring the world back into focus.

And it did. With a surge everything fell into place. It was a hideous revelation. Barry saw the woman reflected back from his mirror, as he felt the sway of his bust, the confinement of his bra, the width of his hips, the weight of his ass.

Barry wasn't a he anymore. Fingers cautiously confirming he was fully a woman, her hands recoiled in shock from the discovery. Barry could only take in the fear-widened eyes in the mirror. She'd gotten her wish.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/cb/ce/e0/...

Fighting the idea of fainting once more, she clung to the edge of the desk until the world stopped spinning. Barry struggled to recall the details of his vague wish. His gaze suddenly shifting to the floor, hunting for the stone. It was behind this... He was stuck as a woman.

'Oh, God, am I a woman forever?', she muttered. Her soft new voice sounding wrong in her ears.

"No." a source-less voice told her.

Whipping around, Barry pressed her fuller rump against the desk, as she hunted for the speaker.

"You wished for this body for a day or a week, and I granted that wish."

"This body." you hands waving up and down your body.

"That is how women dressed in my time." The voice paused, "At least, decent women... are you saying you wish to be indecent?"

"I want to be me again... The male me... Decent me!" your voice rising in panic, as you continue talking.

"You made a wish, and I granted it. It must be granted. You wanted to try being a woman, I made you one."

You hear the impatience in the voice and try to control your fear.

1311111211.content:
It's only as you focus on what you're saying one word at a time, you realise you're speaking Arabic. The genie too... and you understand it.

"Back in time?" The genie seems to muse on your question. Unsure what you mean. She's tilting her head, struggling to understand your question. You have to wonder how long she's been imprisoned in that stone.

"You wanted to be a woman... You wanted to be a harem girl..." she said each word slowly as if confused by the previous wishes herself.

You grit your teeth, muscles clenching in your cheeks. You don't want to nit-pick, but you feel you must object.

"I didn't know you thought women were possessions." you say in your defence.

"You were a man, and you wished to be a woman." she repeats. Her disbelief clear.

"Yes..." The words hiss in a low rasp from your plush lips.

"Then you deserve this..." she gestured to your body.

"Is. this. the. past?" you grind each word out.

"This is a time, when you can exist as a harem girl... serve in a harem." You go to the window again, looking out over the city. Hunting for TV aerials, or satellite dishes, some sign of modernity. Hell! You'd settle for phone lines, or anything....

But nothing catches your eye, as spoiling the historic vista.

"You'll only serve for the day." Finally, the genie relents from your discomfort. You didn't want to contemplate living here and now, as a woman for a whole week.

A knot eases in your stomach, and a sigh spills out.

"You might not be called upon to serve." she adds, "But that all might change if someone else takes possession of my stone."

Whirling back around towards the genie's voice. Your eyes hunt for the stone. Surely still sitting unobserved behind you. The room swirls, as you turn. The genie blurring and disappearing from sight. The whole room blurs as you turn. You plant your feet against the dizzying sensation. The room now is far larger, more a hall than a simple room. The walls painted in simple white. Around the walls a line of script runs outlining the role of a woman, her responsibilities and burdens.

You blink, still shocked to be able to read those words. Absolutely sure, they should just be squiggly lines.

A woman is dutiful : A woman is obedient : A woman obeys her master : A woman anticipates her master's wishes

As the genie blurred from sight, others shifted into your vision. Dressed like yourself, their bodies flaunting their curves. Their modesty protected by high walls. Those same walls serving as your prison.

The only men you see look as if they oil their skin, and look oddly disinterested in all the feminine flesh on display. A eunuch! you realise with a shock.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/91/b5/52/...

You're sure you know what the words are, but the squirming in your stomach starts churning icy cold. You can't deny it any longer, she's made you illiterate, capable only of recognising a few numbers and logos. The letters are beyond you. The genie's ensures you have the right education for a woman in this world.

Hopes of a quiet day of filing, or typing seem beyond your wildest dreams now. Slumping in the seat, you wait to find what's expected of you, with a grim determination.
1311111223315413.title: Too late, you realise you've left the stone.

choices: After a hard day of work, you go home and grab the stone again
As you grow more tired, you begin to make mistakes at work
As you work, you manage to bond with your fellow woman
13111112233154131.content:
With the new realization of illiteracy and wondering how else that genie back in your home had changed your mind, you were almost relieved to feel the van minivan pull to a stop. As the driver opened the back door you recognized your new workplace, it was a fast food burger joint. You recognized those Golden Arches anywhere. Back in your life as Barry, which felt more and more like a literal lifetime ago, you're first job out of high school had been flipping burgers to help pay for school. Eventually you got enough education and you'd worked long and hard enough to earn a corporate gig with a partner company.

But in this world, as Ayesha, you knew that your parents had sold you to that same corporation when you came of age and you've been working at this place ever sense. Without saying a word you and the other robed women were ushered into the building as the sun began to rise. Inside it looked like any other fast food place from your world with a few changes. There were a few more Arabian inspired designs on the wall, and there was a steel bar near the front door with a lot of chains attached for it. Feeling a chill down your spine you guessed it was a place for men to leave their women if they did not wish to dine in their presence. 'Or maybe it's a punishment of some sort.' You thought to yourself hoping you wouldn't have to discover first hand what it was for.

Inside the establishment you and the (other) women were led behind the counter. From your time as a burger flipper back in the day you recognized the layout, but you certainly don't remember chains and collars at each station. One by one, each woman was placed like a cog in a machine. Two girls were attached to the counter to take orders. One girl was chained to a bucket and mop, one woman was placed by the drive through window, one woman was put by the frying station, leaving you to have a collar put around your neck beside the grill.

And roaming around the back area was a man with something sheathed at his hip, he roamed around the work area keeping a close eye on all the workers including you. The doors of the store opened and your day began.

It was miserable work. For hours on end you flipped burgers, chicken, eggs, and whatnot on the smoking hot grill. There were no breaks. There was tap water by the sink if you needed refreshment, but you didn't dare spend more than a few seconds there at a time. Quietly you cursed that damned genie for doing this to you. For making you a woman. For making you property. For making you work non stop at this damned hot as hell grill wearing this damned black uniform that covered your whole body drenching you in sweat. Your eyes were filled with a mixture of fear and hatred as you went about your work as hour 13 of this 14 hour shift continued.
13111112233154131.title: The Minivan pulls up to a burger join

choices: You wonder how you look to them... Or if they even notice, or care?!
A knocking at the kitchen door, sends Naseem scuttling to answer it.
"Concentrate, Ayesha." she hisses, as your attention wanders... again.
Nahid reports you to Naseem, for inattention, and slowing her down.
131111122331541313.content:
You suspect that by the end of the day, you'll stink of the food. The stench of chicken hangs heavily in the air. Or it's already clinging to your clothes. The manager is the only man in the place, and he rules with a swift swish, of his bamboo cane.

He punishes every overheard conversation. Allowing, and expecting only the servers to talk. The kitchen staff, like yourself, are meant to work in obedient silence. The work isn't hard or complicated, your partner at that work station, nods towards the simple pictograms that show you how to do your job.

A tinge of jealousy at being allowed to speak, makes you envy the servers, secured to their tills. That, and the fact that they're farther from the stiffling heat of the kitchen. But, as the day progresses, you see the way they're treated. Having to endure openly lewd staring, frank conversations comparing one server to another. You silently rage, but know you've been guilty of some of that yourself... But, surely not as openly, not as offensively. You think... You hope.

Your colleague illustrates both her job and yours for the first couple of customers, and you quickly pick up what needs to be done. It's startling how much you focus on your work, even surprising yourself at times forgetting that you're in a woman's body. It doesn't feel so alien, as you keep your mind on making the burgers, and a wary eye out for the roaming manager.

Your arse is stung several times, throughout the morning, until you learn that particular lesson. He's generous with the cane, whenever he hears too much chatter. But you do find your colleague 'Nahid', introduces herself to you.

A furtive glance tells you, that she's far bustier than you. Shuffling around each other, you quickly discover that your own shapely rump is a pale imitation of hers too. It's oddly reassuring that you aren't burdened with an overly feminine body. Enjoying the sight as she works from the corner of your eye. You have to remind yourself, that you too, are blessed with your own bust and butt.

As the day goes on, you pick up a few other names for your colleagues. 'Hamida.... Basra... Fathi... and Akia."

Only the fact that they're chained and collared. It does give you a deeper appreciation of the female form. As you try to pick them apart, from their behaviours, timidity, pride, as much as their physical shape.

The too warm uniforms make it hard to be sure you've put the right names to the right people. However, Naseem, you can't forget. Your gaze already snapping about to look for him, at the simple thought of his name.

The afternoon drags on, and you look to the clock to see how long you have left to serve here.
131111122331541313.title: As you work, you bond with your colleagues.

choices: Slavers are coming to take you all
A group of freedom fighters are trying to free you
Nahid's eyes sparkle, "Be careful what you wish for former master Barry."
1311111223315413132.content:
The hours drone on with only the occasional swat from Naseem's cane breaking up the monotony. You kept splitting your focus between your job and Naseem's cane. That damned cane which made you wince each time the crack of it again you or your coworker's flesh. The full body uniforms did little to protect you from the stick. But finally after a few hours, Naseem left the work area. There was a knock on the door at the rear of the kitchen which got his attention. When he left, yourself and the other girls in the restaurant relaxed, just a little. You looked to your fellow kitchen worker Nahid, you'd been so distracted by her generous ass and bust that you hadn't even noticed that she had the most beautiful eyes which were a strange shade of what was almost purple. You were about to act like you would as Barry and flirt with her a little, but the kitchen door slammed open and Naseem ran out.

He pushed by you as though you were a tackle dummy and you almost landed on the flaming hot grill. Nahid actually came over to you to make sure you were okay, a kind gesture that seemed so alien in this world. Before you and Nahid could exchange words, the voice of Naseem echoed through the burger joint.

"EVERYONE WILL LEAVE! NOW!" This was something that the customers were used to, there were no questions as everyone left the store in an orderly fashion. Naseem quickly went to each of the workers and undid their collars. He grunted, "To the van. Now."

"What's going on?" You ask, but the look on Naseem's face told you that you'd made a mistake. He took his cane and swatted it against your face. You fell into Nahid's arms who doesn't let you hit the ground. "They are coming stupid girl. Get to the van."

Not needing to be told again you put on a stiff upper lip and marched to the van. You got in the very back and Nahid sat next to you. As Naseem started up the van and hit the gas you decided it was worth the risk and you leaned over to Nahid and whispered, "What's going on? Who's coming?"

Nahid's purple eyes rose up she subtly leaned over to you and whispered so only you could hear.
1311111223315413132.title: Naseem is startled by some news

choices: "Finally." The man mutters, closing the van on all of you.
"Shit!" he curses, "It's too late." As sirens sound nearby...
"I can't..." you wail, and flee on your own, on foot.
Your heart chills, as you realise, you'll have to leave the stone behind!?!
13111112233154131323.content:
You recognise the words of your genie. Taking her elbows, you drag her aside. Eager to have a private word with her for this tortuous day. The excited murmur from the other girls, is clearly happy, if still confused and nervous.

The genie allows you to pull her aside, allowing the others to spill past. They eagerly get in the back of the minivan. The new arrivals, two women and one man, urging them to stop their hissed chattering.

"This is a secret Canadian undercover group." The genie explained. "The world is different in Canada, and some people are offended by this treatment of women." She answers in a hurried tone.

The man waves Barry and Nahid towards the back of the van, where there's still just enough room for the two of them.

"Come now!" He insists, "Or you'll spend the rest of your lives on your knees, apologising for not stopping your sisters from going." He was looking about, agitation clear on his unveiled face. A wave of jealousy burning through you, at the freedom to reveal his face. A simple display, that would be seen as an act of defiance.

You saw a hint of fear on his face, of wonder, if he was in the presence of a true believer... a woman who believed in her own pitiful state, who might cry out, and end their rescue attempt.

"Genie..." you wailed, pitiously in her face.

But, you see only your co-worker Nahid looking back from those eyes. The trace of your genie lost in those familiar eyes. No longer a passenger in her body, she looked between you, and the back of the van.

"There's no need to be afraid, Ayesha.", she broke your grip on her arms, quite easily.

But an arm trailed, as she stepped away, stepped closer to the van. Inviting you to take her hand, and flee with them. You look at the unconscious Naseem, lying on the floor. His wrath will be terrible when he wakes! He didn't even like you when you were working, you can't imagine how terrible it'll be if you're still here when he wakes.

Nahid's eyes sparkle with delight, as you reach out to take her hand. Her veil hinting at a smile buried beneath it.
13111112233154131323.title: Be careful what you wish for former master Barry.

choices: You go with the freedom fighters to Canada
You do everything you can to stop them from escaping
You take too long.  Naseem wakes up and grabs you as the others escape.
131111122331541313234.content:
After the last 24 hours living as an oppressed woman in this hellish world of that genie's creation all you wanted to do was escape. Every instinct and fiber of your being wanted you to jump into the back of that van and drive off to freedom and Canada. You could finally experience life as a free woman. But you weren't a woman. You stop yourself from just jumping in as you remember yourself. You were Barry. A man who had his wish twisted into madness by the wishing stone. If you left here and went with these freedom fighters you would be giving up life as Barry forever and accepting life as Ayesha that still had so many questions to go with it.

But you couldn't just let them just go away. If Nahid, your fellow worker girls, and the freedom fighters got away surely you would be punished. You doubt they'd just let you go back to living in your home where you could still have the rock and hopefully get turned back, you'd probably spending time in jail...or whatever the equivalent was in this horrible world. These thoughts and more went through your head, you had to make a decision now that would effect you for the rest of your life.

Do you go with them and make a new life for yourself? Or stop them from escaping to a better life and hopefully make the world different with the wishing stone? You stared at the hand reaching out to you in the van as you made your decision.
131111122331541313234.title: To Escape or Not to Escape

choices: "Genie..." you cry out, needing some reassurance.
"As a woman, you are a possession." she answers, "Mistress isn't a title!"
Your rising voice, and panic has attracted someone to your front door.
In an instant you find yourself back in the old, familiar world... Thankfully.
131111123.content:
Terrified in case you're discovered as a woman in this world, you run to lock the front door. You certainly don't want any unexpected visitors discovering you. Alone as a vulnerable woman, you don't want to explore this wider world... at all!

Panic grips you. Being stuck as a woman here is a nightmare. "Genie, make me a man..."

Looking over, you see she's not even attempting any magic.

"Genie, make me a man!" you command, in your new voice, it sounds petulant and whiny.

"Make me a man!" you demand.

She just shakes her head, 'No'.

"Why...." this time you are whining. There's genuine fear in your voice.

"You wished to be a woman, for a day or a week." She answers disinterestedly.

"That wish hasn't been fulfilled yet... A second wish can't be granted until the first has run its course."

Clenching your hands into tiny, futile fists you want to, need to punch someone, to punish someone. Neither the genie nor yourself feel like wise choices.

- - - - -

Closing the blinds, you stop anyone from the street peering in as they pass. You doubt you could pass as a submissive woman from this world. A terrified woman, certainly... But, that doesn't feel the same.

Heart racing, you hunt around your home you aren't sure what you're looking for, but anything that will make it feel more familiar would help.

You doubt you'll find any unisex clothes, or tomboyish things. But, a change to a more normal wardrobe would ease your calm.

The wardrobe itself, is depressingly bland, with everything being discreet and modest. Some items finer than others, a couple trimmed with gold piping, and a couple with pretty designs.

Retreating to the drawers you expect more of the same. You open, and close the top drawer quickly as soon as you see the contents. The selection of underwear is schizophrenic. With lewd lingerie designed only for the bedroom, to tease and please that special man in your life. Others are tailored to minimise a womans' appeal. The sturdy underwear, you pull out, and hold up. The bra and panty sets feel safer for your mind uncomfortable with the frillier, lacier items.

A distracted thought surfaces, a vaguely remembered documentary about Victorians, told of this same double-standard. Repressed and starched in public, but a different story in private behind closed door.

Running your hands around the waist of the panties, you feel the elastic, but there's another band there too. You drop it in horror when you work out it's purpose. A small detail at the front, where you might expect a decorative flower, or detailing reveals the second band. It's leather, with thin cables of steel at the top and bottom.

They're designed to be locked into place. Whether to protect a woman's virtue... or to prevent self-pleasuring, you certainly don't like either option. Dropping them back into the drawer, you bump it closed with a hip. The sudden movement, allowing you to hear the chiming of the delicate padlocks and keys to protect your innocence.

A worrying thought occurs, and your hands dive to your waist. Only to discover you're already locked into a pair of panties. Hoping for better news, you take off your top. You have to shake your head, as you see even the bra is secured with a padlock. The same steel cords reinforcing the band and shoulder straps. The large cups cover and conceal your breasts from the temptations of the flesh too.

Spotting a leather handbag, you reach for it, looking for some hankerchiefs. As you pick it up, you realise you were mistaken. It's not a handbag. It unfurls in your hands, and you have to turn it this way and that. Dropping it in horror as you finally recognise it. It's a gimp hood, designed to be laced tightly around a woman's head.... your head!?, to ensure her silence.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/f1/df/70/...

Kicking it aside, you don't want to touch it any more than you need to... Sending it flying into a corner, to slap against the wall. This only draws your attention to another piece of leatherwork. Hypnotised and fascinated by it, you can't not pick it up... You see it's the match for the hood. Mittens. Without any mobile thumbs or fingers. Designed to keep you dependent and vulnerable, needing a man for any and every task.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/cc/43/2f/...

"Genie, take me back to the real world.... Take me back to my world!" you command. "I'm... I'm your mistress... Obey me!"
131111123.title: Belatedly, you spot the change to your apartment.

choices: Squirming, you discover you're also 'plugged' too.
"You need a master." The genie's voice muffled by the leather.
You mewl and sob in your confinement...
1311111232.content:
The genie planted her fists on her hips, she looked pissed. "I granted your wish to be a woman, and you think yourself poorly served."

She seemed to grow bigger, not physically, but just becoming more intimidating.

"I'm a genie! and you... You're a glorified possession." the contempt clear in her voice.

"You need to learn your place and some manners..."

"Please... please... I'll be good." you promise as you back away deeper into the bedroom. As your legs crash backwards into the bed, you collapse atop it.

"That's your natural place." she nods approvingly, "A women should serve in the bedroom."

"B..But..." you stutter, unsure whether to beg for mercy, promise anything, or wait out your unwise wish.

Even that choice is taken from you. The room vanishes in a flash of brilliant white light. Moments later, you're engulfed in darkness. In a panic, you struggle. But your every movement is constrained. Your breathing hot on your face, and your pulse echoing in your ear.

You realise there are worse things than bondage mittens, and a silencing hood. You're encased head to toe in a leather body bag.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/37/18/1c/...
1311111232.title: "As a woman, you are a possession."

choices: You sink to your knees, and lower your head.
Firmly, defiantly, you cross your arms. You can endure this for a day.
You slip the veil across your mouth and silently pray for her understanding...
131111124.content:
"A day." she answers in a grudging tone. "I don't like having a woman who thinks she's my master." she adds.

"You did it!" you cry, "You made me a woman!" your voice getting louder and more agitated, as you rise in volume. It's only as the shrillness penetrates that you realise your danger. You don't want to draw any attention at the moment.

"I obeyed my master's request." she answers simply.

"But, that was me!" you say through clenched teeth.

"I don't like whiny women." she says with fire lighting in her eyes.

"And I don't like being a woman... whiny or not..." further protests are cut short.

Her hands wave idly in the air, a trace of fire in their wake.

Your hands leap to your mouth, and the pain you feel there. Your fingers scrabble at the threads binding your lips together. You doubt they'll be cut with mere scissors.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/a1/c5/1c/...

You look to the genie who's grin is demonic.

"I can make it permanent if you object further, girl." The tilt of her head is cold and clinical. Reminding you that despite her human shape, she's a vastly different creature.

You get a flash of an image, solid silver rings piercing your lips. Binding them permanently together.

Shuddering, you look to her, ready to promise anything to avoid that fate. But with your lips sewn shut, you have to show your compliance, rather than merely state it.
131111124.title: "Is it for the day, or the week?" you a...

choices: She crosses the room, until you're face to face with her.
She confesses to having been a wizard before she was a genie...
You feel the stitches melt away, your lips free to move. It worked!
1311111242.content:
The thought of what you'd lose if you knuckle under to her demands is just as terrifying. Clearly, she has to obey her master. Even now, as her former master she's in a quandary. If you can wait out the day, you'll be back to being male again. Restored as her master, just for enduring this humiliation.

The fear eating away at your calm, is this latest magic. You thought she couldn't do anything except her master's bidding. Surely, that's part of the genie code.... or something.

With that vague hope, you decide. Defiantly, you cross your arms. Standing as straight and resolute as you can. Every instinct is telling you to surrender, as you think of her overwhelming power. But, if you can get through this day, you'll be back in charge. Back as her master. This world is a nightmare as a woman, but as a man, you can see it having some appeal.

Fixing the genie with your eyes. You try and scowl your anger. But the threads tug at your lips, you just slowly, deliberately shake your head 'No'. If that gesture is unfamiliar across the centuries and cultures your opposition is still clear.
1311111242.title: Firmly, defiantly, you cross your arms.

choices: "You wanted to be a modern woman?" she asks.
You nod your head, not quite trusting your voice yet...
"So... women are free and equal." she says musing at the concept.
Feeling your face, you realise it's changed.
13111112421.content:
It takes all your willpower to stand there, as she marches over to you. Thankfully there's no real difference in height between you. But that's irrelevant with someone who can wield magic.

"All right, so this is a different world." she confesses.

You merely wish you could agree, but your lips are still sealed. You flinch as she raises her hands, expecting a slap or something. Her look of pleasure flashing over her face and quickly masked leave you unsettled.

"Shh..shh... shh..." she calms you. Her hands stroking your face, as if soothing a pet, or stroking a dog.

Her hands settle into place, on both sides of your forehead. You barely have time to do anything before a flood of memories is ripped from your brain. An uncontrollable vomitting of your best recollection of history, ancient and modern, from as far back as you can reach.

A second sickening wave follows, a more personal history this time.

As she steps back, you stumble backwards, until your knees hit the sofa. You crumple into it sitting dully in place, as you try to reorganise your thoughts.

"So that's the world you know..." she said in a musing tone.

She frowns when you don't reply, then glancing at you casually waves her hands in your direction and you feel the stitches evaporate away.
13111112421.title: She crosses the room, until you're face to ...

1311112.content:
Barry finished texting with his sister, because after he said his wish aloud the doorbell of his apartment was ringing. His apartment was in the 1floor so he looked out of the window, who was ringing the door bell, because it was Saturday, rather early morning and he was not expecting any visitors, maybe the postman or the kids from the from the neighborhood playing some prank again… He looked down to see some very attractive woman standing there. Was she really ringing on his doorbell?
“Can I help you?” he shouted out of the window and she said: ”Are you Barry Davidson?”
“Yes”
“Can I come in? I have to tell you something” she said and Barry wondered about this but let’s her in.
Once she was inside his apartment she….
1311112.title: "I wish I could find a girl for me?"

131112.content:
After Barry had taken the rock, he got a call. It was Bridget, one of Barry's closest and oldest friends.

Bridget:"Hey, you busy?" We need to talk."

Barry:"I know, no you can come over."

Bridget:"Okay I'll be over their in a few minutes."

This is the talk Barry had been dreading. A week ago Bridget and him went to a party together. All was fine till they started to make out, and then went all the way. Now for the last week they haven't talked to each for a week. Getting back into his house, she already knew Bridget wanted to stay friends, however Barry loved Bridget. "I just wish she felt the same way about me that I fell about her." Not noticing, the rock had started to glow.
131112.title: Someone else

1311121.content:
Bridget came over as agreed and started complaining that he with his actions and not controlling his sex drive had destroyed their long time friendship…
Barry got back with the point that he is a man and can’t control his sex drive all the time
Then Bridget said: Barry I wish you were a girl for some time!

Barry: Oh yes, then everything would be fine?

Bridget: Well at least then not the sex would be between us!

Barry: oh alright. If I were a woman that would be the best thing for both of us.

Barry touched the rock in the moment and said again: If I were a woman, then we could talk more openly with each other….
1311121.title: Bridget comes over

13111211.content:
Barry suddenly felt weird and collapsed on the floor. Blocking out he had to close his eyes, while his mind still tried to understand and analyze what had just happened. There was a blinding and it came from the rock.

Nah! That had to be his imagination. Surely it was a power surge and he'd caught a bad reflection right into his eyes. He snorted at his casual wish, wondering what it'd truly be like to be a woman for a day, or a week.

Crawling along on the floor Barry asked Bridget to help himself back up. She did that, but when he opened his eyes again he started to feel even worse than before…

His clothes feeling different and his eyes still stung and refused to focus. With help of Bridget he got himself into a sitting position. The sense of wrongness was still there, intensifying if nothing else.

It wasn't just his clothes that felt wrong. Wondering if he'd banged his head harder than he realized, he got to his feet. Swaying slightly as he did. Balancing was harder with his vision still blurry. Scrunching and uncrunching his eyes, he fought to clear away the tears and the bring the world back into focus.

And it did. With a surge everything fell into place. It was a hideous revelation. Barry had a look into the mirror and saw a woman reflected back, as he felt the sway of his bust, the confinement of his bra, the width of his hips, the weight of his ass.

Barry wasn't a he anymore. Fingers cautiously confirming he was fully a woman, her hands recoiled in shock from the discovery. Barry could only take in the fear-widened eyes in the mirror. She'd gotten her wish.
13111211.title: he becomes a woman

choices: Bridget thinks he is and always have been
Bridget has seen the transformation and knows who he is or should be
131112111.content:
Fighting the idea of fainting once more, she like in trance rushed over to the sofa and sits down. Waiting another moment until the world stopped spinning. Barry struggled to recall the details of his vague wish. His gaze suddenly shifting to the floor, hunting for the stone. It was behind this... He was stuck as a woman.

'Oh, God, I’m a woman?', she muttered. Her soft new voice sounding wrong in her ears.
131112111.title: first moments as a woman

choices: Betti wanted to wish Barry back into existence.
Bridget finally seems to spot the oddly glowing stone...
1311121111.content:
Barry woke to find Bridget standing over her.

"Of course you're a woman... and all woman." she gave Barry's ass a friendly pat.

"I just wish you were satisfied with your curves Betti."

Betti né Barry wanted to groan in despair, as she felt history altering. She kept the memories of being Barry, and discovering the stone. But, they felt vaguer now. The parallel memories of growing up as Betti had joined them. Not replacing them, but feeling more vibrant and real.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/21/d0/e5/...

Straightening up, Betti tugged her jumper lower. She wasn't comfy showing her midriff. Alas, it just snapped back up, revealing a taut and toned tummy.

She felt another dizzy spell, turning towards Bridget as she hunted for the stone. It was too late, as she felt the insecurity... An insecurity that vanished almost instantly, as her bust surged larger. It grew with a ripple and a roll, until Betti wanted to wail, the weight at her shoulders was bad, and her back hurt too.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/d5/1b/77/...

Catching her profile in the mirror, Betti was more than satisfied with her curves now. The part that thought of itself as Barry was helpless to intervene. Hating the female body even before the self-esteem boost. Well, if it was anyone else's body he'd be happily ogling it. But, as a prisoner inside that flesh Barry hated it.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/a1/bd/ad/...

"I wish I could be as happy as you." Bridget said.

Betti was still groggy from her own wish, and unable to stop or warn Bridget.

- - - - -

As Barry you were very fond of Bridget's body. The way she filled those leggings was incredible.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/dd/3e/27/...

As Betti's gal-pal, she was free to indulge her own self-doubt.

From one moment to the next Betti watched as Bridget's body changed. Her face took on a distracted look.

"Oh... as I was saying.. Thank God we're both happy with our bodies." A slight frown creasing her forehead.

Barry couldn't take his eyes from Bridget's transformed body.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/db/fb/16/...

With an ass that belonged on a horse, and udders from a cow. She was the epitome of any man's wet dream. Before anything else could go wrong, Betti spotted the stone.
1311121111.title: Bridget thinks he is and always have been

choices: Barry snatched the stone up, and wished himself back to normal.
"So... you grant wishes?" Bridget sounding scarily focused now...
"Am I... Are we your masters?" Barry asked, her voice cracking.
The genie has some small print to get out of the way first...
1311121113.content:
"That is what you both wished for." A sultry female voice says.

The woman accompanying the voice rising from the far side of the table. A woman dressed in what you can only describe as a harem outfit. Her bust tightly constrained, is still full and looks to be on the verge of bursting free. Her side dips in to give her a spectacularly thin waist, where a wide band of material covers her hips, and hint at a magnificently rounded and full arse.

Alas, that's where a pillar of smoke leads back in thinning and darkening column to her stone.

The day was the 21st of June, a date known for two reasons in the Williams' household: The first reason was a customary one, known almost everywhere, that is, the first day of summer, the summer solstice; The longest day of the year.

The fact that this date was the longest day of the year made the second reason this date was known, to the Williams', all the more grueling. On this day, exactly three years ago, a member of this family, this household, was killed in the cruelest of ways: Hit by a drunk driver. It was on this day that a woman, a wife and a mother lost her life, by some off chance. Carrie Williams, the deceased mother of 9 year-old Aaron Williams and wife of 35 year-old Mac Williams.

Silent, solemn and frail were among the adjectives that could be used to describe the melancholia that was spread about the Williams' house. Provided that the day was a Saturday, and that Mac was a teacher at a local high school, Mac had the day off. And what did Mac do with his day off? Nothing. Just Mac lounging about the house, doing random house-chores if need be, and feeling so dang sorry for himself.

Mac's son, Aaron, remain idle and in wonder. Though, of course, the loss of his mother, especially at such a young age of 6 years, did still bother him, Aaron managed to... Move on, but really forget. Aaron was a boy who took this day to remember his loving mother. How exactly did he remember? Keepsakes. In the Williams' attic, right in the corner of the room, was a box, a chest of sorts.

The chest itself was essentially an homage to the matriarch of the Williams' household, along with it's contents. The chest itself was a toy chest that Carrie used as a little girl. Ironically, she obtained it when she was the age of her son, Aaron. In the chest were things of all sorts: Contents ranged from articles of clothing, such as the dress Carrie donned when she became wed to Mac, all the way to other pieces of memorabilia such as jewelry, a teddy bear Mac gave her as a teenager and copies of favorite cd's, movies and things of the like. Really, in it were many of Carrie's favorite belongings.

Just then, the silence that persisted in the house was broken by the sound of a sort of struggle. Right below the attic's entrance stood Aaron, jumping and extending his arms as far as he could, attempting, and failing, to reach the nylon rope that, when pulled down, would pull down with it the stairs to memoriam. Though he failed many times, time and time again, Aaron persisted. But, alas, even with the aid of an improvised staircase made of books and stools of all heights, Aaron still had trouble getting up there.
But this, too, was a tradition of sorts to Aaron. Always would his father, Mac, sulk around and drown in his own sorrows, paying his son not a mind in the world. Aaron went to his room and opened up a pocket-watch given to him by his mother. After Aaron diagnosed the time, he announced his diagnosis aloud.

"11:11." Aaron said in his relatively high-pitched, prepubescent voice. After he announced the time, he took his right hand and began counting down from three.

"3...2...1..." Aaron lipped, not making a sound. Upon his arrival at 'one,' his father dragged himself below the entrance to the attic, reached up with both hands and tugged on the string. After which, Mac took a step back while he and Aaron watched the stairs fall to their feet, the ground releasing a cloud of dust as the stairs made impact.

Without a word, Mac left the area, returning to his own affairs.

Aaron shot his father a sour look as his back was turned. But, he did get the attic open. Aaron looked up into the attic, seeing only darkness, looked back to the direction where his father had fled to and, with that, began to venture into the dark, dusty attic.

"Gosh... Why's he so bitter all the time? Well... Not all the time. He was fine yesterday, and he'll be fine tomorrow, like he is every year. It's just today he's so weird. Like every year." Sighed Aaron as he finally landed in the attic. Aaron looked around the intimidating atmosphere of the room. Nothing was visible. Only darkness. Darkness and the echoing sounds of silence, not that sound was visible, but no less present.

Anyway, Aaron slowly walked to the center of the room, the floor boards creaking with each step he took. Once at the center, he put a hand in front of his face, grasped the rope that dangled there and pulled.

"Let there be light." Aaron said, looking for his mother's box.

He looked around and realized this room was only a prison, a hoarding place for relics of the past. Everything was drowned in dust, brown and dull. In a way, Aaron saw a little bit of his father in this room. It was much like he was on this day, every year, for the past couple of years: Dull and stuck in the past.

That's when Aaron spotted the box he sought, much to his delight. Upon seeing it, he smile a wide smile, a twinkle could even be spotted in his eyes. Even in relics of the past, the box of his angelic mother stood out in the most positive of ways: His mother's box was a light at the end of a dark tunnel, a gem among pebbles, an angel among angels. And, in this case, a thriving memory among the dead dreams and beings of yesterday.

Aaron, in a manner giddier than his very first day of school ever, Aaron gently opened the chest up. The chest itself was white with blue edges, decorated in various stickers of childhood, to photographs that represented each part of her life: Childhood, womanhood, and motherhood.

Aaron looked into the box and smiled at what was beheld. All of her treasures. He looked in and found his old blanket, his favorite as a toddler, his parents claimed. He reached at an old-looking teddy-bear his mother owned as a girl. As he dug further and further into the box, he felt a particular softness, the softness prevalent in women's clothing. He pulled out the article of clothing. His mother's wedding dress. He held it and gave it a sniff.

"Ah!" Aaron whiffed in a satisfied manner. "It even smells like her!" He smiled.

Next in the chest of treasures was a photo album. Aaron excitedly skimmed on through it. He saw pictures of himself as a baby, with his mother, in the hospital room. Another image showed his father holding Aaron, as a baby. In the picture, Aaron noticed something that saddened him. That smile his father had. It was a smile Aaron hadn't recalled seeing in what had to be years. He continued browsing, beholding pictures of his mother with her father, Aaron's grandpa, pictures of his mother as a teenager, as an adult before she was pregnant and while she was pregnant. And so on. Finally, Aaron arrived at the last page of the album. In it was simply a picture of himself, his father and his mother, all sitting in the kitchen happily.

This image also managed to send Aaron into distress for one sole reason. The date that picture was shot was the day she... 'Went Home,' as his father put it. 'Where she belongs,' as he put it further.

This statement that stemmed from his father confused Aaron and, at times, infuriated him. As he examined the picture, a tear shed from his eye.

"How can he say she went home?" Aaron argued. "Home is here! With me and dad! She doesn't belong there! Wherever she is! She belongs, and should be here, with us! This is her home! And always will be!" Aaron cried softly.

Wiping a tear from his eye, he set down the photo album and moved on. Next was her jewelry box. Aaron sniffled and smiled, he recalled that she loved jewelry. Aaron grabbed the box and opened it up and saw... Something he is sure he had never seen before.

"What the..." Aaron said as he pulled out a jewel of sorts. To be exact, a blue emerald. It really was quite the sight to see. Aaron brought it closer to him and examined it closer. While the emerald was being examined, he noticed that a letter lay under the stone.

"Hmm..." Aaron grabbed the letter, noticed it had no mailing address and opened it up, in the most curious of ways.

"Dear Aaron,

Don't be sad, Dear! Be sad not that it's over, smile because it happened! Those words'll get you far, y'know! Anyhow, if you've found this letter, Sweetie, it's because you haven't forgotten me! Thanks for keeping me in your memory. Now, I bet you're wondering about that stone you found on top of this letter. Well, you're bitter old father probably won't understand this, but I have the utmost confidence that you will! You remember how you and I both just loved magic! Well, that's what this jewel is! Magic! This emerald has the grandest of powers. It grants wishes! Any wish one can think of, really! Just say 'I wish,' followed by your wish, and voila! It's yours! But, we've both seen those movies where a wish is worded incorrectly and, thus, backfires. That's the same case here. Be very careful what you wish for, Dear! It may come true! Now, I know your father'll probably never believe this was written by me, or that the stone is magic, but, please, show it to him anyway. Let him see that magic is real, and that magical things happen everyday!

Love you to pieces, Aaron!

Sincerely, Carrie Williams."

That's all she wrote.

"Wait..." Aaron confusedly said. "This has got to be a joke! She couldn't have written this. She's... Y'know..."

"But, I did understand one thing in the letter!" Aaron chirped. "Magic and wishes!" Aaron then excitedly packed up his mother's belongings, grabbed the emerald and stormed out of the attic. Though... The letter was left behind.

13121221.content:
Aaron felt a jolt running through his veins. A jolt he'd never felt prior to this moment. Aaron believed it to be what he's heard the adults call 'adrenaline,' but, really, he just felt extremely excited.

"Wow!" Aaron exclaimed, closing the door to his room and panting violently as he examined the gem before him. "A wishing stone! A real wishing stone!"

A wishing stone. Who knew, they were real. Apparently his mother knew. Well, no matter who knew of their existence, here he was, wishing stone in hand. It truly was incredible. Foolish things such as a wishing stone were things heard only in the tall-tales mothers and fathers recite to their sons and daughters on a nightly basis.

"Thanks, Mom!" Aaron shouted, pulling the emerald tightly to his chest.

"Mom was right! Magic is real!"

In case you didn't know, Aaron and Carrie were sort of... What society called 'geeks.' The kinds who often found themselves lost in their obscure ways. The kinds who often found themselves lost in the confines of their imaginations. But, no matter how 'lost' in their wild imaginations they were, they sought no map. Aaron and Carrie were the kind of mother and son who found themselves believing in Santa Claus among other fantastic figures. Aaron denied only once that this was his mother's work. But, c'mon, a wishing stone? Something as magical as that was something only his mother could pull off.

"Now..." Aaron started. "What to wish for..." he contemplated, stroking his chin in the most thoughtful of ways...

His thought process came to a sudden halt. "I've got it!"
13121221.title: Aaron & The Wishing Stone

131212211.content:
Whilst Aaron thought of the great fun he and his mother often had together, and all the good times that were shared, his thoughts managed to shift back to his father.

More often than otherwise would Mac fail to understand the common interests of his wife and son. Unlike his wife and son, Mac was 'the norm.' Fun-loving. He liked fun. Only liked. Imaginative. Hardly, even failing to enjoy cartoons that his wife and son loved. To think that Mac would enjoy magic was unimaginable, even for someone like Aaron.

This made Aaron pity his father. He and his father didn't necessarily have a bad relationship, but their relationship didn't excel either. And, ever since Carrie passed, the dating scene hadn't treated him all too well, this Aaron saw too often.

Aaron came to a conclusion. His father was a very lonely man. Almost hopelessly so. But, right then and there, it came to Aaron.

"I've got it!" Aaron announced. "I bet I could help!"

"I wish Dad wasn't so lonely!" Aaron wished, holding the stone up in the air as proud as can be.

Aaron listened in for some sort of noise indicating that the wish had been granted. "..." Aaron listened. "Nothing."

He looked to the stone for a glimmer or shine of some sort that indicated success. "..." Aaron stared into the stone. "Nothing."

"Maybe Mom was... Wron-.. No! No! She can't be!" Aaron nearly doubted.

And right when all hope for the wish's success seemed lost, a bright, white, blinding light shone like a new light bulb.

(Who changes?)

13121221122211.content:
With a flash the stone activated, and Aaron felt everything around him shifting as a horrible ringing filled his ears. Beneath his feet he could feel the floor twisting, though the light was so bright that he couldn't see what was happening. Even if he had been able to however, the event was over, though the brightness remained. With a grimace of pain, Aaron raised the hand that contained the stone up and used it to block out the painful rays as his eyes slowly adjusted. As the gold-white faded, the long curvature of a beach came into view, it's pearly white sand stretching opposite of the endless horizon of an ocean. Luxurious homes broke through the lush green foliage of the low ridge that sat just behind the beach, though Aaron only counted five until the line of homes trailed off beyond his line of sight. Several gulls called to each other as they flew low over the cresting waves, and Aaron could feel the warm, yet comfortable breeze on his skin and smell the ocean in the air.

Aaron turned from the ocean view and stared at his new interior surroundings. It was no doubt a mansion equal to the other palaces he had seen dotting the beach. The boy had never seen a house so richly decorated, at least not in person. Just standing there made him feel suddenly self-concious, and he looked down, expecting to see his worn out t-shirt and shorts only to be met with surprise by the designer clothes he now wore.

"Woah" he whispered to himself, and he opened his closed fist to stare at the tiny gemstone laying in his palm. The almost too perfect rays of the sun caught it just right, and a emerald flair filled the room. Aaron closed his eyes and braced for another change, but after a moment opened them to find that nothing had changed, just the sunlight refracting through a beautiful gemstone. The boy sighed, glad nothing had changed this time.

Wait. This time.

"Oh crap!" Aaron yelled and he made for the modern-styled staircase that lead out of the fully furnished loft into a even larger and more palatial room. Marble columns, marble floors, statues, even a fountain! But Aaron didn't pause as he raced through the home of someone who was impossibly wealthy, the only thing that concerned him right now was finding his dad.

"DAD! WHERE ARE YOU DAD!?" He called out, his reedy voice echoing off the walls and down into the recesses of the house. Aaron was met with silence, though that didn't stop him. The young boy raced from room to room, through the fully furnished theater, through the empty spa, between the fleet of cars of the enormous garage and around all three swimming pools, and even out onto the hot sand, but there was no trace of his father.

But then, as he was making his way sullenly back up the stairs from what he figured was the 'basement' apartment, he heard the colossal doors in the main hall slam. His heart began pounding so hard that Aaron thought it would burst out of his chest, and he pumped his little legs as hard as he could as he ran towards the noise.

"Obviously the stone just made us rich! Dad was probably just exploring the house like I was and we just kept missing each other!" He thought to himself, but as soon as he reached the main hall, his excitement vanished entirely.

There, before him, decked out in the latest high fashion trends and done up like a movie star, was a young woman who smiled at Aaron with perfect white teeth before rich, full lips, and her sparkling blue eyes dazzled him with their brilliance. Her large breasts swung magnificently in her dress as she fully turned to face him, and the white fabric showed off her perfect rear and slid just enough to reveal a impossibly toned leg, covered in perfectly tanned flesh, and a long, silken black mane of hair swished slightly while she turned.

"Oh Aaron! There you are! I was sooooo worried about you! I didn't mean to leave without telling you where I was going, but I just had to go meet the producer for this movie AND my modelling agent! It was SUCH a a last minute thing, but since we were just right down the street I figured you'd be okay! PLEASE don't be mad at me!" The woman said, her melodic voice carrying on the air like nothing Aaron had ever heard before. She obviously knew him, but he didn't recognize her at all. But his confusion didn't appear to register on the woman's impossibly pretty face, and before he realized it she had crossed the room and pulled him into a powerful little hug.

"I know that today is difficult for you..." She whispered, her breasts pushing against Aaron's face and her hair trailing down over his neck, "I know today was the day your parents died and that you're still not comfortable living with your cousin, but I, Jessica, will ALWAYS take care of you!"

The sudden revelation was too much for Aaron, and he felt himself slipping through the woman's grasp as his body went limp, and he thought he felt something slip out of his hand and onto the hard floor. The darkness of panic induced unconciousness took him, and he knew no more.

131221.content:
The Harris household stood inactive. This was a particularly strange phenomena. The home was typically anything but silent. Sounds of cheer, laughter, and whatnot typically rang through the halls of the Harris home, despite the fact that it was only called home by two occupants, a father and his teenage daughter. But, at this particular moment, nothing. The halls echoed only the sounds of silence, joy rang not about the home. However, all things, such as the ever-present silence in the Harris home, must pass.

Just then, the sound of quiet chatter and soft laughter could be heard, slowly increasing in volume as the voices slowly approached the door. The unusual sound of silence died as soon as the front door had violently slammed open. Two teenage girls walked in, chatting away, laughing over this and that among other things. Though, one of the girls seemed a bit... Awkward. As if she was out of place.

Then, one of the girls spoke out. "So... Rachel," the first girl began to the other, sitting on the couch, crossing her legs femininely as she did so, a sour taste residing in her mouth as she said 'Rachel.' "... How do ya think the day went?" She asked 'Rachel.'

"Oh, it went just fine, Pen! Just fine!" 'Rachel,' 15 years old, enthusiastically blurted, throwing her petite body onto another couch, throwing her feet onto the ottoman, spreading her legs out in a comfortable manner, in a manner as a grown man would do to make himself comfortable. "How do you think it went, Penny? You seemed a bit out of place all day." 'Rachel' asked Penny.

"Well... Yeah!" 15 yeard old Penny yelled. "It's because... Don't you find it a bit strange that my father is..."

"That your father is currently in the body of a teenage girl? Yeah, that's a bit strange..." 'Rachel,' finished.

"But I am your father, y'know, the one who is usually a man, but today is a teenage girl!" 'Rachel,' chirped. "I get that it's weird that one minute I'm your Dad and next I'm a girl your age and your classmate! But, I'd expect that I'd be the one out of place rather than you. I'm the one that changed bodies and I'm doing just fine! Ya gotta calm down." 'Rachel,' asserted.

"Yeah... I guess you're right..." Penny said, giving in. "Hey, Dad..."

"In this body, I'm 'Rachel.' Not 'Dad!'" 'Rachel' snapped teasingly.

"Fine, 'Rachel!' Hasn;t it already been 12 hours? You can change back now!"

"Oh, right!" 'Rachel,' said grasping the stone, shutting her eyes and wishing "I wish I was back in my original body!"

The change from the 15 year old teenage girl, Rachel, back to her 43 year old male self, Ray, was practically instantaneous upon her wish. Her dirty blonde hair had gotten shorter, going from a few inches past the shoulders to about ear's length, the color also changing from a dirty blonde, suited to a teenage girl, to brown, suited for an adult man. Her height also drastically changed, going from a petite 5'4" to 6' in seconds time. Her clean shaven female legs had sprouted hair all over, looking more masculine than feminine. And... Other changes, as in the 'male member's arrival,' took place as well. And, just like that, Rachel, high-school girl was no more, in her place was Ray, 43 year old man and single father.

"Well," Ray began. "That was fun while it lasted, and it worked out way better than when I had become a teenage boy."

Ray's daughter, Penny, remember that day all too well, laughing to herself as she remembered. Her Dad had wanted a day off, so he became a teenage boy at her school. She remembered hearing that her father thought being a teenage boy 'Just as he remembered it.' Boring! So, today, he'd do the same thing, but change into a teenage girl. And, he seemed to be having a better time a girl than a boy. Penny supposed this was because the experience was so radically different than the male experience he had been used to his whole life.

"So tell me, Honey... Why have you never used the stone?" Ray asked, gesturing to 'The Wishing Stone,' as they called it.

"Well..." Penny said, taking a sigh, "Becoming someone else, someone completely different just seems too... Weird. Really weird, actually!" Penny justified, stroking her brunette hair behind her ear as she did.

"Yeah, Honey, it is a little weird. But, come on! The opportunity we have with this thing is unimaginable! Everyone says, 'Put yourself in that persons shoes,' With this stone, we can! We can take something figurative and make it literal! Reality!

"But, Dad? Haven't you ever worried about staying stuck in a body not your own? What if you were to become your teenage-girl form, 'Rachel,' and, for whatever reason, become stuck as her? What would you do?!"

"Oh, Penny!" Ray laughed to his cautious daughter. "That's all part of the fun! You're just like your mother! She and I, before she had gotten sick, had a boat load of fun with this very stone! Becoming different people and loving it! You are acting just as she did when I tried to get her to try this thing out! She was 'What if this? What if that?' Very careful was she! Eventually, though, my convincing had worked, and, before y'know it, she was changing more often than I! We had the time of our lives with this thing!"

When Penny heard she was just like her mother, she smiled. Penny's mother, Laurie, had died of cancer of the brain when Penny herself was about 2. In that, Penny had never personally known her mother, though she would've loved too. All the time, Penny's father let her know what kind of person her mother was, the good and the bad. Penny imagined her mother to be quite the remarkable woman, with flaws of course, but no less remarkable.

Penny went up to her father and grabbed the stone, examining it carefully.

"And you're sure nothing bad can happen when I change into someone?"

"Don't worry, Pen. I'll make sure nothing bad happens. Just remember, you can;t change back to your original form for 12 hours!"

Penny looked the stone over, again. "Fine." She finally sighed, giving in to her father's insistence. "I'll use it... Later though! Maybe tonight."

"Really?!" Ray said, in a manner as excited as his teenage form, Rachel.

"Yeah..."

"Well, do you have any idea as to who you want to become?" Asked Ray ecstatically.

Penny answered, solemnly...
131221.title: Father and Daughter

1312212.content:
Penny took a step back, folded her left arm across her chest, placed her right elbow upon the folded arm, placed her right hand upon her her chin and went into thought. A unique opportunity has been presented to her.

Given her age group and gender, a 'unique opportunity,' was the chance at dating some idiot, or to be in the presence of the popular crowd, a group of morons kissing each other's behinds, ridiculous parties and all that the title 'popular,' came with. These foolish things encompassed a 'unique opportunity,' for a teenage girl.

"Now this," Penny began, "Is a unique opportunity." she vocalized only in her mind, as she gazed at the stone held in the hands of her father, eyes twinkling as some cartoon character. To experience life from another's perspective, to be ale to embody any person you want? It really was quite the opportunity, provided only to a handful of worldly citizens.

Penny Harris finally stated aloud "Honestly, Dad... How'd you even get your hands on such a thing?"

"Well, daughter of mine, that's an answer for another day..." Ray explained vaguely to his daughter, scratching the back of his head bashfully as he did so.

"Now," Ray said, quickly fleeting from the subject of the origins of the stone, "You have any idea as to who, or what, you want to be?"

"Well..." Penny sighed, "No." She finally said abruptly.

"No idea?" Ray asked, puzzled.

"None whatsoever, Dad."

"None?" Ray asked once again, a smug smile spreading across his face.

"No?" Penny said again, confusedly. She knew the smile that was spreading about his face all too well. He had a plan Penny was sure she herself would not approve of.

"Are you asking, or answering, Pen?"

"Answering."

"Well, then..." Ray uttered, beginning to pace around the room.

"If you have no idea..."

"What are you getting at Dad?"

"... I sure do!" Ray finished.

"Dad?" Penny concernedly asked.

Ray then spoke out, out of the blue.

"I wish I were...!"
1312212.title: Unique

13122121.content:
"I wish I were my daughter, Penny Harris!" Ray said, practically shouting at the top of his lungs, probably even to the point of exceeding them.

With those uttered words, Penny's eyes grew wide with a sort of fear. Her father becoming anyone else, boy, girl, man woman, no matter the age or gender, she could handle. However, she had to draw the line at her father intruding on her life by becoming... Her. What if he had no idea as to how to act as she does. If he were to make one mistake in acting, surely he'd sell them both out and they'd end up headlining the news.

Penny gave a wince as she witnessed the changes occur, quite fast, actually. First, his masculine features were all radically softened, becoming features Penny possessed, clean shaven legs, arms, face, baby-soft skin, legs and thighs emphasizing more feminine fat and less muscle. Signs of age died also, becoming youthful and soft. His legs lost muscle and became more slender, his feet going from a men's size eleven to a woman's size six. His height radically dropped, transitioning from 6' tall to 5'4" short. His brown hair grew in length from above the ears to about shoulder blade length, the hair also became just a wee bit lighter in color, turning from dark brown to a lighter shade of brunette. His eye color stayed the same, brown, but his eyelashes grew just a bit. His lips became fuller, though lacked in lipstick. Penny wasn't too big on cosmetics. The nails on the ends of the fingers grew in length and became glossed in a sky-blue color. Thus, Ray Harris had become his own daughter, Penny.

"So?" Ray, from Penny's body, in her sweet, melodic voice asked, "What do you think?" Ray said, batting his eyes.

"I think it's a bit weird you're still wearing you're male clothes..."

"Oh, you're right... I wish my clothes matched my body!"

And, just like that, Ray's t-shirt and blue jeans changed into jean shorts and a blue tank-top, complete with the sneakers Penny always donned. Now he was a spitting image of Penny Harris.

"Now what do you think?" Ray asked again.

"I think you're insane!!" The original Penny scolded to her father, no longer having to look up at him, given they were now eye-to-eye in height.

"Don't talk to yourself like that! You really should treat yourself with more r-e-s-p-e-c-t." Ray laughed, teasingly, going back to the couch, throwing himself unto it, again, taking on the masculine manner of sitting he was oh-so used to.

"This is NOT funny!" Penny growled, throwing her hands on her hips.

"What's not funny about this? I find it hilarious

"You don't plan to go out in my body, do you?"

"That sounds like a great idea, daughter!" Ray said, getting up off his rear to retrieve the keys to his car.

"You're kidding right?" Penny asked, infuriated.

"Why would I be kidding?"

Penny, cringed a little, still sort of freaked out to hear her own voice talking back to her, finding it even scarier her own father was the point of origin.

"Dad, you have no idea how to act like me! If you make an acting flaw, you'll blow it for both of us!"

"Pen, of course I know how to act like you. You're my daughter! Why wouldn't I?"

"And..." Penny started, her voice cracking in anxiety, pausing only to search her mind for words to halt her father in stepping out. She smiled as if she had the answer.

"Besides..." Penny smiled. "There can't be two of us! And I don;t even have a license! How're you gonna get around now?"

Ray, in Penny's body halted, pretending to be shocked. Again, he had an idea.

Penny smiled to herself. Her father's steadiness alerted her that she had succeeded in stopping her father.

"Oh!" Ray cried, faking it in Penny's form and voice. "Whatever will I do! You're right! There can't be two of us!"

Penny's smile of victory began to die down just a little. She knew her father was going somewhere with this, she just knew not where...

"And, you're right! Penny Harris can't drive!"

Penny's victorious smile died right there.

"But!" Ray began. "Her Dad, Ray Harris does!"

"Oh no you're not!" Penny shouted.

Ray raised the stone he held in his hand and wished. "I wish Penny Harris was her father, Ray Harris!

"Oh." Penny spoke out, eyes bulging and becoming wide in fear.
